Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Convolvulaceae

source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Bindweeds (Convolvulus L.: Convolvulaceae) in Victoria
source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (2012). Bindweeds (Convolvulus L.: Convolvulaceae) in Victoria. In: Victorian Naturalist 129, pp. 10-19. Field Naturalist Club of Victoria, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Corolla-tube about as long as calyx; style and stamens shortly exserted; plant variously hairy; leaves broad and/or under 5 mm long
Corolla-tube greatly exceeding calyx; style and stamens much exserted; plant more or less glabrous; leaves narrow, at least 5 mm long
Leaves concave, imbricate, distichous, silvery; plant with appressed hairs
Leaves flat, not imbricate or distichous, green; plant with spreading hairs
